channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Everything Samsung Announced at Its Summer Galaxy Unpacked Event
item.description: Samsung has unveiled three new Galaxy folding phones and a trio of smartwatches in the Galaxy Watch8 series.

item.title: Samsung brings back the Classic version for the Watch8 series
item.description: Samsung launched the Galaxy Watch8 smartwatch today at its Unpacked July 2025 event, along with the Galaxy Watch8 Classic version with a rotating beze...

item.title: 201 Prime Day Deals Picked By People Who Obsessively Test Gear
item.description: We review products year-round and spend weeks evaluating Amazon Prime Day deals to pick the best bargains on quality gadgets.

item.title: Samsung launches Z Fold7 and Z Flip7, adds a cheaper Z Flip7 FE to its foldable lineup
item.description: With its new foldable lineup, Samsung's trying to attract a broader segment of users to its most significant new phone format in years.

item.title: China Has Attempted What Might Be the First-Ever Orbital Refueling of a Satellite
item.description: The SJ-21 and SJ-25 satellites “merged” on July 2 and have remained together since then.

item.title: PR is your scaling power: Learn from Insight Partners’ Nikki Parker at TechCrunch All Stage
item.description: PR and marketing are more than just press releases — they’re powerful tools for attracting investors, customers, and top talent. At TechCrunch All Sta...

item.title: Google brings Gemini to Wear OS watches, adds AI Mode to Circle to Search
item.description: Google is rolling out Gemini to Wear OS watches, the company announced on Wednesday.

item.title: 6 days until TechCrunch All Stage kicks off in Boston — and up to $475 in ticket savings disappear
item.description: In just 6 days, the doors to TechCrunch All Stage swing open in Boston’s SoWa Power Station — and your chance to save up to $475 slams shut. This isn’...

item.title: Best Prime Day Apple Deals on iPads, AirPods, and MacBooks (2025)
item.description: If you need to replace your [insert Apple product here], this Amazon Prime Day is a chance to snag it at a significant discount.

item.title: The 5 Best Prime Day Action Camera Deals for Thrill Seekers (2025)
item.description: Action cameras are perfect for travel, social media vlogging, and careening around the lake on a jet ski. Upgrade your action camera with one of these...
